A moon-filled veniom pendant ("silver-flecked light azure haze").

Includes Continuance, Nature, Phoen, Ages, serene bloodrunes, as well as the uncarved stones for Fash'lo'nae, Temporal, Mularos. I can include an chisel and a totem so you can carve one of those.

Example of the Continuance rune: Through a silver-flecked light azure haze, you see Nuadjha ensconced in a shroud of pure sunlight. His eyes are pools of deep blue reminiscent of an afternoon sky. Misty clouds of white occasionally drift across his weathered golden brown skin, which is chiseled with mystical runes glowing with power.

More info: https://gswiki.play.net/MoonShard_pendant

CB: 35m MrMortimur (PC) ONCE BO: 50m

Cash accepted at $5 per.
